english.segment1: Diety's blood, spilled for you. For indeed Christ was our passover. Hanging on a bloodied cross. A bloodied cross
english.segment3: Father forgive them for they know not what they do. Peter denied three times. They draw near to me with their mouth but their hearts. Are far from me
english.segment5: Do not be afraid for He is risen. All authority has been given to Him. Worship Him, and only Him. Jesus Christ, the Almighty
english.segment7: Jesus said, this is the blood of the new covenant. Shed for the remission of sins. That it might be fulfilled. Which was spoken by the prophets
